sentence: Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., has seen his support among members of his party evaporate after salacious claims he made about being invited to sex parties and witnessing drug use on Capitol Hill.
author: Nicholas Morgan
title: Republicans Turn On 'Embarrassment' Madison Cawthorn After Comments About Sex Parties, Cocaine

sentence: So, congratulations are in order for that firebrand Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C. Where the insurrection and a speaking gig at white nationalist event have failed, you, my friend, have found success.
author: LZ Granderson
title: Ewww. Madison Cawthorn went too far.

sentence: WASHINGTON Rep. Madison Cawthorn, R-N.C., was cited Tuesday for having a loaded 9mm handgun at a TSA checkpoint at Charlotte Douglas International Airport, the second time he has been stopped with a firearm at an airport since taking office last year.
title: Rep. Madison Cawthorn cited for having a gun at Charlotte airport
